detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine knit lambswool with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Sports trousers in sturdy jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with zipped pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and wrapover front with ties at the side. Long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and side pockets.
Long polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made from partly recycled polyester.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a metal fastener at the front.
One-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with one twisted shoulder strap to create a draped effect at the top, and a low-cut back.
Long-sleeved linen shirt with a grandad collar, classic front, yoke at the back and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Straight fit with a rounded hem.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For the matching jacket, search on 0241602.
Blouse in soft, patterned, gently draping fabric with a V-neck and visible seam at the front. Pleats on the shoulders, short butterfly sleeves and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Trousers in soft washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake fly with a button, zipped side pockets, welt back pockets and slim, shaped legs with stitching on the knees and elasticated hems.

Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Soft faux shearling linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2 cm.

Checked suit trousers in a stretch weave with an extended waistband with hook-and-eye fasteners, and a zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, and jetted back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Imitation leather wallet with a zip around three sides. Four card compartments, one note compartment and a small coin compartment with a press-stud. Size 2x10x11.5 cm.
Clutch bag in textured velour with a flap and metal buckle, a narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x25x16 cm.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Short, gently flared nightslip in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs that finish just above the knees. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Hat in a soft, chunky rib-knit cashmere blend with a turned-up hem.
Ballet pumps in shimmering imitation leather with a strap over the foot. Satin linings and insoles.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Decorative buttons at the top, a back pocket and sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves and hems.
5-pocket, high-waisted jeans in sturdy washed denim with hard-worn details and a motif. Gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Chinos in cotton twill with side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button. Adjustable waist and a fake fly with a decorative button.

Slightly longer jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high collar, zip at the top, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Full-length, pleated dress in mesh with a deep V-neck, wrapover top and shoulder straps with silicone trims. Concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back, and a seam at the waist. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves.
Mules in imitation leather with crossover straps at the top. Gently moulded imitation cork insoles and chunky ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
Top in a cotton blend with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Calf-length dress in a patterned weave with a sheen. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist with a detachable fabric belt, and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Bell-shaped skirt in stretch imitation leather with a visible zip at the back. Jersey lining.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a button and narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from partly recycled cotton with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood. Ribbed cuffs and ribbing with a decorative wrapover detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in sequined mesh with short, frilled sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Calf-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave with a high waist with covered elastication. Jersey underskirt.
Ankle-length suit trousers in a crêpe weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Fake front pockets with decorative metal buttons, and straight, wide legs with creases.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Windbreaker in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Welt side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Oversized biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux shearling lining and large, faux shearling-lined notch lapels. Diagonal zip down the front and a detachable belt at the hem. Faux shearling trims at the cuffs and hem.
Dungarees in soft stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with embroidery on the front and sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in lightweight jersey made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated waistband, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a yoke and cap sleeves in lace. V-neck, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and a narrow elasticated seam under the bust. Jersey lining.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
Ankle boots in imitation patent leather with square toes, a zip on the inside and block heels. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 9 cm.

Long dress in sequined mesh. Narrow cut at the top, a halter neck with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, and a concealed zip in one side. Concealed, adjustable elastication under the bust and a flared, heavily draping skirt. Jersey lining.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elastication around the top.
Calf-length dress in soft, patterned satin in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Straight cut that widens at the hem. Lined at the top.
Ankle boots with covered block heels and a shaft with a visible zip in one side. Fabric linings and imitation leather insoles. Platform front approx. 1.5 cm, heel 9 cm.
Cap-sleeved top in softly draping jersey with a double-layered stand-up collar that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Imitation suede jacket with notch lapels, buttons down the front, two patch front pockets with a flap and button, and a tab and button at the front of the hem. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed press-stud at the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared peplum. Matching belt in woven fabric with a covered metal buckle. Width 5.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Lace A-line dress with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck, short cap sleeves and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Short, high-waisted skirt in a textured weave with pleats at the top, a zip at the back and side pockets.
Scarf in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides.
Wide sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric, one with a print motif on the front. Cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Balconette bra in lace with lightly padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
